messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM from a language perspective. I have no idea regarding its technical accuracy. http://codereview.appspot.com/5794071/diff/1/doc/install.html File doc/install.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5794071/diff/1/doc/install.html#newcode54 doc/install.html:54: /usr/local/go (or c:\Go under Windows), is backslash safe in HTML? http://codereview.appspot.com/5794071/diff/1/doc/install.html#newcode71 doc/install.html:71: Windows users should read Setting environment variables read the section about

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=55fdf8b7afbc *** doc: windows zip archive installation instructions Fixes issue 3254. R=golang-dev, r CC=golang-dev http://codereview.appspot.com/5794071 http://codereview.appspot.com/5794071/diff/1/doc/install.html File doc/install.html (right): http://codereview.appspot.com/5794071/diff/1/doc/install.html#newcode54 doc/install.html:54: /usr/local/go (or c:\Go under Windows), On 2012/03/13 03:47:27, r wrote: > is backslash safe in HTML? Yep. Amazing innit http://codereview.appspot.com/5794071/diff/1/doc/install.html#newcode71 doc/install.html:71: Windows users should read Setting environment variables On 2012/03/13 03:47:27, r wrote: > read the section about Done.

subject: code review 5794071: doc: windows zip archive installation instructions
